mapper.select: SELECT A.trip_id, A.title, A.content, B.trip_review_pic, (SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM trip_like WHERE trip_review_id = A.trip_review_id) AS like_count ,(SELECT COUNT(review_id) FROM review WHERE user_id = A.user_id) AS review_count ,(SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM recent_tr WHERE trip_review_id = A.trip_review_id) AS recent_count , A.trip_review_id, C.name, C.profile_pic FROM trip_review A LEFT JOIN trip_review_pic B ON A.trip_review_id = B.trip_review_id LEFT JOIN user C ON A.user_id = C.user_id LEFT JOIN review D ON A.user_id = D.user_id LEFT JOIN recent_tr E ON A.trip_review_id = E.trip_review_id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN #{orderType} = 'latest' THEN A.created_at END DESC, CASE WHEN #{orderType} = 'popular' THEN like_count END DESC

SELECT A.trip_id, A.user_id, A.title, A.content, GROUP_CONCAT(B.trip_review_pic ORDER BY B.trip_review_pic) AS trip_review_pics, (SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM trip_like WHERE trip_review_id = A.trip_review_id) AS like_count, (SELECT COUNT(review_id) FROM review WHERE user_id = A.user_id) AS review_count, (SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM recent_tr WHERE trip_review_id = A.trip_review_id) AS recent_count, A.trip_review_id, C.name, C.profile_pic FROM trip_review A LEFT JOIN trip_review_pic B ON A.trip_review_id = B.trip_review_id LEFT JOIN user C ON A.user_id = C.user_id LEFT JOIN review D ON A.user_id = D.user_id GROUP BY A.trip_review_id, A.trip_id, A.title, A.content, C.name, C.profile_pic ORDER BY CASE WHEN #{orderType} = 'latest' THEN A.created_at END DESC, CASE WHEN #{orderType} = 'popular' THEN like_count END DESC, A.trip_review_id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}

SELECT A.trip_id, A.title, A.content, B.trip_review_pic, (SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM trip_like WHERE trip_review_id = A.trip_review_id) AS like_count ,(SELECT COUNT(review_id) FROM review WHERE user_id = A.user_id) AS review_count ,(SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM recent_tr WHERE trip_review_id = A.trip_review_id) AS recent_count , A.trip_review_id, C.name, C.profile_pic FROM trip_review A LEFT JOIN trip_review_pic B ON A.trip_review_id = B.trip_review_id LEFT JOIN user C ON A.user_id = C.user_id LEFT JOIN review D ON A.user_id = D.user_id WHERE A.trip_review_id = #{tripReviewId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recent_tr (user_id, trip_review_id, inquired_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{tripReviewId}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE inquired_at = NOW()

INSERT INTO sche_memo (trip_id, `day`, seq, category) SELECT #{tripId}, `day`, (@rownum := @rownum + 1) AS seq, category FROM sche_memo, (SELECT @rownum := 0) AS r WHERE trip_id = #{copyTripId} AND category = 'SCHE'
mapper.select: SELECT schedule_memo_id FROM sche_memo WHERE trip_id = #{copyTripId} AND created_at >= (SELECT MAX(created_at) FROM sche_memo WHERE trip_id = #{copyTripId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule (schedule_id, distance, duration, pathtype, strf_id) SELECT #{scheduleMemoId}, distance, duration, pathtype, strf_id FROM schedule WHERE schedule_id = #{originalScheduleId}
